TopicTitle: Docking Camera Mode, but not the way you think...

Articles.Content: Suggestions for a docking camera generally seem to aim for a first-person view or periscope view. That would be nice, sure, but I think a fine "kerbal" way to do things is have a toggle-able camera mode (like the ones you switch through with 'C') that centers itself exactly between the two vessels. This would give the illusion of the two moving toward each other and you can be front row to the action that is docking! Just making sure it's clear what vessel you're controlling though might be an issue. Anyway, there it is!
